Summary: saw hovering and meandering object with orange lights for 3 minutes emitting no sound over water by neighborhood of oyster creek,witnessed with 2 other persons about 10 pm
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
trends: There has been one other sighting in Ocracoke
There were no other sightings in Ocracoke on or around July 6th 2013
divs: Sighting Detailsjust to let u know i reported something i saw around myrtle beach this winter,was unsure of sighting.this however was seen by me and 2 witnesses and it was airborne.approximately 10 pm last nite myself and 2 others saw a hovering orange light which was visible to me for about 3 minutes.when i first saw this i thought it was a star,but upon closer observation i noticed it was MOVING,it was not an airplane or helicopter and it emitted no sound.i was standing in the street and saw it was over the water behind ocracoke island,the oyster creek neighborhood.2 friends saw me and stopped to ask what i was doing and i found out they too had seen it earlier and saw it while they were talking to me.they said it was really fast and had seen it earlier.i have not seen them since the sighting because i didnt ask them enough questions at the time,it was saturday nite.anyhow the objest seemed to hover and move back and forth for a ways in a random pattern but on one of the turns i saw it was triangle shaped becuse the lighting on the bottom i guess was in that pattern,i dont think it changed shape or anything because you know its hard to make out details in the sky at nite but it was there right off my neighborhood anyhow i strongly suspect this may be the military because we have had sightings before especially about 10 years ago before the v22 osprey was operational and deployed overseas i knew what i saw then was coming from cherry point but there were usually a half dozen or so of those and we were permantly kicked off while scanning using a hand held scanner but heard a distinctly human male voice before being bumped.that was then we know what that was this was seen by us and made us excited i guess and after about 3 minutes it dissapeared below the trees and we did not see it again.our observation was about a hundred yards or so form the neighborhood and there were trees in the way as that allowed the object to retire from site,nothing fast just meandered away really.i would say this was about the size of a small car as i said i was walking from my neighborhood along the main road and saw what i thought was a star,i have mistakenly thought stars might be something upon sighting them,but if they dont move its your eyes playing tricks on you.however this seemed to move so i stopped in the middle of the road and looked closer and it did move,back and forth like it was looking for something.it had orange lights so it wasnt a star and while i was looking at it my friends stopped and saw it again all i can say is it seemed triangular after i saw that pattern of lighting,the size of a small car maybe a little bigger its hard to judge hovering and meandering giving out no sound on a quiet nite but like im said the military has lots of bases around here so i thought i should let you know i did not see any entities so i put robotic since this was a machine,you should work on that
